AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: dock builder
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Pyandonea had a great need for docks, and [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the many that helped fulfil that need.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: shipwright
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of the many shipwrights found on Pyandonea, a profession that was always in demand there. Dunmeri ships are quite unlike any other, for they are constructed out of chitin instead of wood. Of course this difference in building technique didn't make it any easier for [PAWN_nameDef].

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: ghostfence maintainer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] spent quite a few years maintaining the Great Ghostfence, a difficult, but highly rewarding job. Sadly, the constant swarms of cliff racers [PAWN_pronoun] had to deal with, heavily outweighed the satisfaction of protecting the Dunmer.
